mods.abstract: Tennessee-Carolina Fair commercials, advertising the September 2-7 fair (likely 1957, unconfirmed) which is set to include appearances from Preston Foster and Tex Ritter amongst others.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
